name: FGG prototype (1.0.0.0)
description:
The assets are not mine!  I got my assets here: https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer

I'm also currently following a tutorial for this project, which is linked here: 


I will eventually make my own assets, but for now I won't since I have little idea what I'm doing.

Movement is arrow keys. There is a secret smiley face, see if you can find it!

To "beat the game" you have to parkour all the way to a 1 by 3 platform. That's it. Have fun!
